name: Finance Team
message: @Richard Starkey (JDI) & @Louis Atouguia Big props for the energy and traction you’ve built with our funding partners. The relationships you’re developing are helping chart the next leg of our journey and giving the rest of us plenty to be optimistic about.

name: Recruitment Team
message: @Ihor Kazmin & @Dane Miller Recruiting legal and accounting roles in Ukraine isn’t for the faint of heart, but you’ve both shown grit and focus in filling our critical roles in Ukraine. Those hires will be huge wins for us as we build out these teams and your persistence is making a real impact.

name: Stephanie Gaskins
message: You somehow managed to provide support to the compliance team while representing us at AUSA...and you did it all with your trademark calm and precision. You’ve been a rock for your team and a great example of what “owning it” looks like.

name: Viktor Irchak
message: Your leadership on our biggest project yet has been incredible to watch. You’ve kept the team inspired, focused, and moving in sync, even through the tough stretches. We’re lucky to have you steering this ship. Looking forward to our official kick off team meeting coming soon!

name: Legal Team
message: @Faizan Peshimam & @Oksana Cherniienko You two have been absolute powerhouses this week. The long days reviewing documents and tackling challenges on the modular project didn’t go unnoticed. Your teamwork and commitment kept things moving...thank you both for being steady anchors through the chaos.

name: Unmanned Systems Department
message: Seoul ADEX 2025 - While @Jordan Krulik focused on identifying Unmanned Systems solution partners in the US, @Vlad Konov traveled to Seoul, South Korea to attend ADEX 2025 to do the same on the other side of the globe.

name: Sales Department
message: AUSA 2025 - Last week, @Patrick Becker, @Stephanie Gaskins, @Hilary Warren, @Steven Snakebite Kendrick, and @Jordan Krulik traveled to Washington, D.C. to the AUSA Annual Convention.  This is an annual conference hosted by the US Army, but widely attended by all US Military and Federal Defense organizations, as well as delegates from a wide variety of foreign allied governments and militaries, and features 1000+ exhibiting companies.  It's one of the largest and most valuable defense events that takes place each year.  The sales team spent 2 1/2 days traversing the massive trade show floor to conduct strategic meetings with current and prospective customers, as well as identify new vendor partners.
